name: Axe
skill: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

name: Enchantress
skill: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.

name: Tusk
skill: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

name: Drow Ranger
skill: Increase attack damage and speed of Drow Ranger.

name: Bounty Hunter
skill: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce to Tracked targets within a 1200 radius of each other range.

name: Clockwerk
skill: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor damage and mini-stun.

name: Shadow Shaman
skill: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

name: Bat Rider
skill: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing enemy reactions.

name: Tinker
skill: Launches 3 rockets to hit random enemies.

name: Anti Mage
skill: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

name: Tiny
skill: Toss an enemy nearby, throw it to the farthest grid and stun

name: Mars
skill: Mars enters the battle in a defensive stance and cannot attack. Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides. Periodically Mars smashes enemies in a 3-grid radius in front of him with his shield, dealing physical damage.

name: Winter Wyvern
skill: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

name: Crystal Maiden
skill: All allies' mana regeneration increased

name: Beastmaster
skill: Sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once

name: Juggernaut
skill: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.

name: Timbersaw
skill: Whirls extremely sharp edges. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Pure Damage.

name: Queen of Pain
skill: Lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

name: Puck
skill: Launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way.

name: Witch Doctor
skill: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

name: Slardar
skill: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage.

name: Chaos Knight
skill: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

name: Luna
skill: Luna's attacks bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

name: Furion
skill: Call a treant from a random tree around the chessboard

name: Morphling
skill: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

name: Mirana
skill: Fires a long-ranged arrow with deadly precision to an enemy chess in another chessboard currently under attack/defence from friendly chesses, dealing damage and stun the target. Damage and stun duration increase with range.

name: Lich
skill: Applies a magical frost shield around an allied piece, granting bonus armor. While the shield is active, ice magic will be affecting enemy pieces within 4 squares every 1 second, doing minor damage. Enemy pieces attacking the protected ally will be impeded by the icy energy, which slows their attacks.

name: Lycan
skill: Lycan assumes his lupine form, gaining more HP and summoning 2 wolves.

name: Venomancer
skill: Summons a Plague Ward to attack enemy chess pieces.

name: Omniknight
skill: By the power of the Omniscience, Omniknight instantly heals a friendly unit and damages enemy units near it. 200 / 300 / 400

name: Razor
skill: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage and slowing enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increase with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once in each direction.

name: Windranger
skill: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow deals damage to enemy units and destroys trees in its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

name: Phantom Assassin
skill: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining the chance to deliver a devastating critical strike to enemy units.

name: Abaddon
skill: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage to the area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

name: Sniper
skill: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit, and after a few seconds fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.

name: Viper
skill: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

name: Shadow Fiend
skill: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy.

name: Lina
skill: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

name: Terrorblade
skill: Terrorblade transforms to ranged and heals to full.

name: Treant Protector
skill: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Pulses 7 times.

name: Dazzle
skill: Prevents ally heroes from dying for a 4 seconds duration. Chooses the allies with the lowest HP.

name: Doom
skill: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time. Doom also dispels the hero.

name: Kunkka
skill: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage.

name: Troll Warlord
skill: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stack drops to zero.

name: Keeper of the Light
skill: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line. The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.

name: Necrophos
skill: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

name: Templar Assassin
skill: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage. These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

name: Alchemist
skill: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units within the contaminated area take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

name: Disruptor
skill: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

name: Medusa
skill: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned and take bonus Physical damage.

name: Dragon Knight
skill: Transforms the Dragon Knight into a powerful elder dragon. Level 1: Green Dragon with Corrosive Breath. Level 2: Red Dragon with Corrosive Breath and Splash Attack. Level 3: Blue Dragon with Corrosive Breath, Splash Attack, and Frost Breath.

name: Lone Druid
skill: Summon a powerful Spirit Bear. Bear improves with level and has chance to root enemies, disabling attack.

name: Gyrocopter
skill: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.

name: Tide Hunter
skill: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

name: Enigma
skill: Damages enemy units in an area of effect based on their maximum hit points.

name: Techies
skill: Plants an invisible mine that will only activate when manually detonated.

name: Death Prophet
skill: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy chesses. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.

name: Zues
skill: Zeus strikes all enemy pieces with lightning, no matter where they may be, upon cast, every enemy piece will have 50% chance to get hit, each hit deals fixed magic damage and damage proportional to their current health – it is guaranteed to hit at least 1 target even if all units fail 50% chance. Upon victory deal percentage damage to the enemy courier.

name: Io
skill: Wild card. Io★ can finish any ★ combo. Io★★ can finish any ★★ combo.

name: Sven
skill: Sven gets pumped up! The rogue strength grants bonus damage to Sven and all allied Demon pieces for 60 seconds. Also, Sven's attacks can deal 50% Cleave damage to enemy pieces within 2 square.
